overview: The Weavers are share-croppers who confront their landlord with their tale of woe only to find he is in money trouble too. He also has a wastrel son and a socialite wife who wants a divorce. He begs the Weavers to trade places with him and fix things up.
tagline: The Weavers Brothers and Elviry Go-To-Town to teach the city folk how to live...in the good ole mountain manner!
title: In Old Missouri
